SELECT tp.id as id, tp.code as code, tp.value as value, tp.issuedStation as issuedStation, tp.issuedDate as issuedDate, GROUP_CONCAT(tp.useAbledStation SEPARATOR ',') useAbledStation, tp.indate as indate, tp.status as status, tp.usedStation as usedStation, DATE_FORMAT(tp.usedTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as usedTime FROM ( SELECT t1.id as id, t1.code as code, t1.value as value, case when t1.status <> '3' then t2.orgName when t1.status = '3' then '' end as issuedStation, t1.issuedDate as issuedDate, t4.orgName as useAbledStation, t1.indate as indate, t3.constantName as status, t5.orgName as usedStation, t1.usedTime as usedTime FROM disp_card t1 left join sys_orga t5 on t1.usedStation = t5.orgCode and t5.delFlag = '0' left join sys_orga t4 on t1.useAbledStation like CONCAT('%',t4.orgCode,'%') and t4.delFlag = '0', sys_orga t2, sys_constant t3 WHERE ((t1.status = '3' and t1.createStation = t2.orgCode) or (t1.status <> '3' and t1.issuedStation = t2.orgCode)) and t2.delFlag = '0' and t1.status = t3.constantValue and t3.kind = '11' and t1.delFlag = '0'
and t1.status = '${status}'
and t2.orgName like '%${issuedStaName}%'
and ((t1.status = '3' and t1.createStation = '${orgCode}') or (t1.status <> '3' and t1.issuedStation = '${orgCode}'))
and t1.code = '${code}'
and t1.value = '${money}'
and t1.issuedDate >= '${startDate}'
and t1.issuedDate <= '${endDate}'
and t1.indate <= '${inDate}'
ORDER BY t1.status, t1.code ) tp GROUP BY tp.code ORDER BY tp.status, tp.indate, tp.code

SELECT tp.id as id, tp.code as code, tp.value as value, tp.status as status, GROUP_CONCAT(tp.useAbledStation SEPARATOR ',') useAbledStation, tp.issuedDate as issuedDate, tp.indate as indate FROM ( SELECT t1.id as id, t1.code as code, t1.value as value, t3.constantName as status, t2.orgName as useAbledStation, t1.issuedDate as issuedDate, t1.indate as indate FROM disp_card t1, sys_orga t2, sys_constant t3 WHERE t1.useAbledStation like concat('%',t2.orgCode,'%') and t2.delFlag = '0' and t1.status = '1' and t1.status = t3.constantValue and t3.kind = '11' and t1.delFlag = '0'
and t1.issuedStation = '%${orgCode}%'
and t1.code = '${code}'
ORDER BY t1.status, t1.indate, t1.code ) tp GROUP BY tp.code ORDER BY tp.indate, tp.code
